subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: ATLANTA, Sept. 3 (AP) — Maybe it was the heat. Perhaps it was a carry-over from a bad loss to the Florida Marlins. Whatever it was, Ryan Howard and Aaron Rowand could not make contact, and the Philadelphia Phillies lost again.
snippet: ATLANTA, Sept. 3 (AP) — Maybe it was the heat. Perhaps it was a carry-over from a bad loss to the Florida Marlins. Whatever it was, Ryan Howard and Aaron Rowand could not make contact, and the Philadelphia Phillies lost again.
